entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 06:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.4°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon except gusting to 50 near Haro Strait. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
